sage.scene.state

Class ZBufferStateRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.state.RenderStateRecord
      • sage.scene.state.ZBufferStateRecord

  • public class ZBufferStateRecord
extends RenderStateRecord
    ZBufferStateRecord holds a record of the current ZBufferState values stored in a RenderContext. ZBuffer state values include
    • whether zbuffer depth testing is enabled or not,
    • whether the zbuffer is writable or not,
    • the current ZBufferState.TestFunction used by the zbuffer
    Author:
    John Clevenger

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ZBufferState.TestFunction getDepthTestFunction()
      Returns the identifier for the Depth Test Function currently specified by this ZBufferStateRecord.
      void invalidate()
      Invalidates all state information in this ZBufferStateRecord and marks it as depth testing not enabled, writable = false, and having an undefined depth function value (-1).
      boolean isDepthBufferWritable()
      Returns whether or not this ZBufferStateRecord is marked as writable.
      boolean isDepthTestEnabled()
      Returns whether or not this ZBufferStateRecord is marked as having Depth Testing enabled.
      void setDepthBufferWritable(boolean isWritable)
      Marks this ZBufferStateRecord's writable flag according to the specified parameter.
      void setDepthTestEnabled(boolean yesNo)
      Marks this ZBufferStateRecord's depth test enabled flag according to the specified parameter.
      void setDepthTestFunction(ZBufferState.TestFunction func)

        Parameters:
